metadataAttributes.Title: Business and Financial Modeling Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Build Business and Financial Models. Use spreadsheet models to make data-driven financial decisions
metadataAttributes.Skills: Financial Modeling, Microsoft Excel, Simulation, Linear Programming (LP), Modeling, Linear Regression, Probabilistic Models, Regression Analysis, Monte Carlo Method, Solver, Risk, Cash Flow,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Richard Waterman ,Don Huesman ,Sergei Savin ,Senthil Veeraraghavan ,Richard Lambert ,Robert W. Holthausen ,
